thread.section_title: Mouser Electronics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mouser Electronics | www.mouser.com
thread.title: Jose Imenez
thread.title_full: Mouser Electronics reviewed by Jose Imenez

author: Jose Imenez
title: Jose Imenez
text:
This is 2017. You guys need to accept Paypal or the like. it a pain hunting for CC at the last minute plus start an account . if anything an account is a pain to open and a privacy risk. I buy $35000 /month and typically will avoid suppliers that do not offer google pay or paypal. You guys happen to have the product but buying it is a pain. At least guest checkout!
Otherwise love the online catalog.
